text: Two ships of the Royal Navy have borne the name Pentstemon (or Penstemon) after the flower: *, an launched in 1916 she was sold in 1920 into mercantile service as Lila. Subsequently, became the Chinese gunboat "Hai Chow" and sunk in 1937. *, a launched in 1941 and sold in 1946 into mercantile service as Galaxidi. ==References== * Category:Royal Navy ship names
title: HMS Pentstemon
